message: I'm willing to be generous, but 60-40 isn't fair to me. How about we go 55-45?
I'm willing to compromise, 58-42 is as low as I can go for now
We're running out of time, and the value is decreasing. I'm proposing a 52-48 split as my final offer.
You said 52-48 was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. Meet me in the middle at 57-43
This is getting ridiculous.  I'm proposing a 50-50 split to end this now before we both lose out.
You're getting desperate, I can tell. 56-44 is my new offer, take it or leave it
